evidence.claim: Outright Home Services utilizes AWS for their cloud infrastructure.
The company employs HIPAA compliant standards for handling sensitive health information.
They offer integration patterns specifically for connecting to various EHR systems.
Outright utilizes Twilio for communication services in their health platform.
They implement FHIR standards for their health data exchange processes.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence found of using X12 transactions or EDI services.
